questions.question: 1. Who is sometimes called as father of Angularjs?
questions.explaination: Misko Hevery called as father of Angularjs.

questions.question: 2. Which of the following is correct about TypeScript?

options.ans: This is a superset of JavaScript.

questions.explaination: All the options are correct about TypeScript.

questions.question: 3. What is the decorator used for configuring your module class?
questions.explaination: @NgModule decorator used for configuring your module class.

questions.question: 4. Which angular decorator allows us to define the pipe name that is globally available for use in any template in the across application?
questions.explaination: Pipe angular decorator allows us to define the pipe name.

questions.question: 5. Which character is used for chaining multiple pipes?
questions.explaination: | character is used for chaining multiple pipes.

questions.question: 6. RxJS can be used for?
questions.explaination: RxJS can be used for Browser & Server Side.

questions.question: 7. How Observables are Used?

options.ans: The Reactive Forms Module uses reactive programming and Observables for listening to user input
The @output() decorator in a component takes an EventEmitter instance. EventEmitter is a subclass of the RxJS Observable

questions.explaination: Observables are used both two options.

questions.question: 9. Which of the following is not a hook application life cycle?
questions.explaination: ngViewStart is not a hook application life cycle.

questions.question: 10. Router is part of which of the following module?
